comment.author: 26881258@N07
comment._content: Surely a beauty of a picture, but .... obviously a wrong identification. This is the unique Gotha WD-9 Marinenummer '572' (see list of marine numbers of Peter M. Grosz). Obviously the typed text underneath this picture also identifies it as a Gotha WD-9.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/varese2002] Thanks! What do you think of the new Flickr layout?
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives

comment.author: 26881258@N07
comment._content: The new Flickr layout is way better than before and presents the pictures much better. A big advance which places Flickr again on top of the 'free' picture sites. Of the payng variety Smugmug is way out the best seen, but yes it costs somewhat.
